overview: How the French Secret Services attempted to quietly sink Greenpeace's flagship "The Rainbow Warrior" in Auckland Harbour in 1985, and ended up killing one innocent Portuguese photographer and sending to a New Zealand jail two of their best secret agents. The story is told through the eyes of the female secret agent Dominique Prieur, aka "Sophie Turenge".
tagline: French Secret Services attempted to quietly sink Greenpeace's flagship "The Rainbow Warrior"
title: Opération Rainbow Warrior
